name: Bread and Mayo
description:
In this game, your goal is to jump over mayonnaise and have the highest score you can. 

Controls are basic: Just left click of mouse in menus  and space for jumping(you can use mouse instead of space).

If you want, in the folder are sprites of characters I made, backgrounds I downloaded and music that I also made my self(except the background music) everything is copyright free, so you can copy something if you want to.

Code: https://github.com/asiLukas/Bread-and-mayo-code/tree/master
